description:
Bishop is aboard the Jacinthe when she and her adjutant are caught in the trap of the Neo Terrors.
She is married to Major Amada.
She is a Space Federation Force lieutenant colonel and a high-ranking investigator belonging to the Armed Forces Military Police Investigative Department.
She is a beautiful commissioned officer possessing both charm and cool, calm, and collected judgement.
She is from Planet Titan and in the New Soral faction.
She is investigating the illegal activities masterminded by a big-shot politician in the Neo Terrors faction. She has observed the den of iniquity of the Neo Terrors faction, smeared in corruption and impropriety, has from the beginning been of the opinion that harmony throughout the galaxy can only be achieved through the New Soral faction, which burns with ideals and righteousness, and exposed the many wrongdoings of the Neo Terrors faction. From her performance record and beautiful features, she is highly popular with the citizens of the New Soral faction and extolled as the Reason of New Soral.
Source: Kangoku Senkan DVD, Vol 1; official website`s character page, translated by lf412
name: Lieri Bishop
